SEARCH
程序包 Repository

类 AccountRepository

java.lang.Object
Repository.AccountRepository
public class AccountRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing user accounts in the Smart Finance Application. This class provides methods to read, save, and query user data stored in a CSV file, ensuring thread-safe operations using a read-write lock.
版本:
1.0
作者:
Group 19

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    private final String
    accountsFilePath
    The file path for the CSV file storing user account data.
    static final String
    EXPECTED_ACCOUNT_HEADER
    The expected header for the accounts CSV file.
    private final ReadWriteLock
    lock
    A read-write lock for thread-safe access to the CSV file.

      The file path for the CSV file storing user account data.

      A read-write lock for thread-safe access to the CSV file.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AccountRepository

      public AccountRepository(String accountsFilePath)
      Constructs an AccountRepository with the specified file path.
      参数:
      accountsFilePath - The path to the CSV file storing user account data.
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file path is null or empty.

  • 方法详细资料

    • findByUsername

      public User findByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by their username.
      参数:
      username - The username to search for.
      返回:
      The User object with the specified username, or null if not found.

    • save

      public void save(User user)
      Saves a single user to the CSV file in append mode.
      参数:
      user - The User object to save.

    • readFromCSV

      public List<User> readFromCSV()
      Reads all user accounts from the CSV file.
      返回:
      A list of User objects, or an empty list if an error occurs.

    • saveToCSV

      public boolean saveToCSV(List<User> users, boolean append)
      Saves a list of users to the CSV file, with an option to append or overwrite.
      参数:
      users - The list of User objects to save.
      append - true to append to the file, false to overwrite it.
      返回:
      true if the save operation was successful, false otherwise.
